Classes/JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView.name: titleImage
Classes/JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView.abstract: UIImage object that is drawn instead of the title in the UINavigationBar.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: disableBlur
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Disable blurred background by setting this property to true.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: enableDarkMode
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Sets the blur style to dark theme which is applied before all other customization options. Light blur is used as standard.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: foregroundColor
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Sets the color of the foreground. If nil the standard color will be used.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customLightFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the font name of your light font used within the application.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customRegularFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the fontname of your regular font used within the application.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customMediumFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the fontname of your medium font used within the application.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customBoldFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the fontname of your bold font used within the application.

Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.name: customItalicFontName
Classes/JumioBaseView.html#/c:objc(cs)Ju.abstract: Set the fontname of your regular italic font used within the application.

Protocols/JumioAppearance.html.name: JumioAppearance
Protocols/JumioAppearance.html.abstract: Protocol that is used for all UI Objects to be customized via UIAppearance

Classes/JumioBaseView.html.name: JumioBaseView
Classes/JumioBaseView.html.abstract: Base class which is used to set our SDK via UIAppearance pattern

Classes/JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView.name: JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView
Classes/JumioNavigationBarTitleImageView.abstract: UIView that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used to define the uiimage that is - when set - drawn instead of the NavigationBar title.

Classes/JumioDeviceInfo.html.name: JumioDeviceInfo
Classes/JumioDeviceInfo.html.abstract: NSObject that holds information about the device.

Protocols/BAMCheckoutViewControllerDeleg.name: -bamCheckoutViewController:didFinishScanWithCardInformation:scanReference:
Protocols/BAMCheckoutViewControllerDeleg.abstract: Called when the SDK finished with success.

Protocols/BAMCheckoutViewControllerDeleg.name: -bamCheckoutViewController:didStartScanAttemptWithScanReference:
Protocols/BAMCheckoutViewControllerDeleg.abstract: Called when the SDK is loaded and a scanReference is already present.

Protocols/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayVi.name: -bamCheckoutStoppedWithError:retryPossible:
Protocols/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayVi.abstract: This method is called when an error occured while the ScanViewController is opend

Protocols/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayVi.name: BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayVi.abstract: Protocol that has to be implemented when using BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayViewController

Protocols/BAMCheckoutViewControllerDeleg.name: BAMCheckoutViewControllerDelegate
Protocols/BAMCheckoutViewControllerDeleg.abstract: Protocol that has to be implemented when using BAMCheckoutViewController

Classes/BAMCheckoutScanOverlay.html#/c:o.name: borderColor
Classes/BAMCheckoutScanOverlay.html#/c:o.abstract: Set the UIColor that should be used for the scan overlay

Classes/BAMCheckoutScanOverlay.html#/c:o.name: textColor
Classes/BAMCheckoutScanOverlay.html#/c:o.abstract: Set the UIColor for text elements displayed on the scan overlay

Classes/BAMCheckoutPositiveButton.html#/.name: borderColor
Classes/BAMCheckoutPositiveButton.html#/.abstract: UIColor that is used to draw the border.

Classes/BAMCheckoutPositiveButton.html#/.name: -setBackgroundColor:forState:
Classes/BAMCheckoutPositiveButton.html#/.abstract: Sets the background color for specific states.

Classes/BAMCheckoutPositiveButton.html#/.name: -backgroundColorForState:
Classes/BAMCheckoutPositiveButton.html#/.abstract: Returns the background color for specific states.

Classes/BAMCheckoutNegativeButton.html#/.name: borderColor
Classes/BAMCheckoutNegativeButton.html#/.abstract: UIColor that is used to draw the border.

Classes/BAMCheckoutNegativeButton.html#/.name: -setBackgroundColor:forState:
Classes/BAMCheckoutNegativeButton.html#/.abstract: Sets the background color for specific states.

Classes/BAMCheckoutNegativeButton.html#/.name: -backgroundColorForState:
Classes/BAMCheckoutNegativeButton.html#/.abstract: Returns the background color for specific states.

BAMCheckout Appearance.html#/c:objc(cs)B.name: BAMCheckoutBaseView
BAMCheckout Appearance.html#/c:objc(cs)B.abstract: Base class which is used to set our SDK via UIAppearance pattern

Classes/BAMCheckoutNegativeButton.html.name: BAMCheckoutNegativeButton
Classes/BAMCheckoutNegativeButton.html.abstract: UIButton that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used within our confirmation or error views and invokes a negative action (e.g. cancel, retry).

Classes/BAMCheckoutPositiveButton.html.name: BAMCheckoutPositiveButton
Classes/BAMCheckoutPositiveButton.html.abstract: UIButton that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used within our confirmation or error views and invokes a positive action (e.g. readable, OK).

Classes/BAMCheckoutScanOverlay.html.name: BAMCheckoutScanOverlay
Classes/BAMCheckoutScanOverlay.html.abstract: UIView that implements JumioAppearance protocol that is used to tint our scan overlays.

Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.name: delegate
Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.abstract: The delegate that handles the callbacks sent from the ScanViewController

Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.name: verticalCardFrameOffset
Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.abstract: Sets the vertical offset of the cardframe overlay from the center.

Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.name: -hasFlash
Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.abstract: This method can not be called if scanning is paused or stopped

Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.name: -hasMultipleCameras
Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.abstract: This method can not be called if scanning is paused or stopped

Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.name: -isFlashOn
Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.abstract: This method can not be called if scanning is paused or stopped

Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.name: -currentCameraPosition
Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.abstract: This method can not be called if scanning is paused or stopped

Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.name: -retryScan
Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.abstract: Call this method if you want to restart the capturing process.

Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.name: -stopScan
Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.abstract: Call this method if you want to stop the capturing process.

Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.name: -cardFrame
Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.abstract: Call this method get the position of the card-frame on the screen.

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: delegate
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: A delegate implementing the BAMCheckoutViewControllerDelegate protocol

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: apiToken
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: The API token of your Jumio merchant account

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: apiSecret
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: The corresponding API secret

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: reportingCriteria
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Identify the scan in your reports. Set it to nil if you don’t use it. (Maximum characters: 100)

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: dataCenter
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Specifiy the DataCenter that should be used

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: offlineToken
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Set this token to use the SDK offline

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: customOverlay
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Set the optional implementation of a custom overlay view controller

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: supportedCreditCardTypes
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Specify which card types your app supports by combining BAMCheckoutCreditCardType constants using the C bitwise OR operator

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: expiryRequired
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Enable scanning of expiry date (default: YES)

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: expiryEditable
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Set the expiry field editable (default: NO)

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: cvvRequired
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Require cvv input by the user (default: YES)

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: cardNumberMaskingEnabled
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: The card number is displayed masked on every view (default: YES)

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: cardHolderNameRequired
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Enable scanning of card holder name (default: YES)

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: cardHolderNameEditable
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: User may edit the scanned card holder name (default: NO)

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: sortCodeAndAccountNumberRequired
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Enable scanning of sort code and account number (default: NO)

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: vibrationEffectEnabled
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: The device will vibrate shortly if a card is detected.

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: soundEffect
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Set the file name to a sound file to give a short audio feedback to the user when the card is detected.

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: enableFlashOnScanStart
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Automatically enable flash when scan is started

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: cameraPosition
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Set the default camera position

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: statusBarStyle
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Configure the status bar style for the duration BAMCheckoutViewController is presented

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: -addCustomField:title:keyboardType:regularExpression:
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Custom fields the user is asked to fill in to finish a scan. Retrievable via the fieldId in BAMCheckoutCardInformation.

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.name: -addCustomField:title:values:required:resetValueText:
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html#/c.abstract: Custom fields the user is asked to fill in to finish a scan. Retrievable via the fieldId in BAMCheckoutCardInformation.

Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html#.name: cardExpiryDate
Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html#.abstract: The expiry date of the card in the format ‘MM/yy’ (e.g. ‘01/12’)

Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html#.name: cardExpiryMonth
Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html#.abstract: The expiry month of the card in the format ‘MM’ (e.g. ‘01’)

Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html#.name: cardExpiryYear
Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html#.abstract: The expiry year of the card in the format ‘MM’ (e.g. ‘12’)

Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html#.name: cardSortCodeValid
Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html#.abstract: Gives information if the card sort code is valid

Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html#.name: cardAccountNumberValid
Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html#.abstract: Gives information if the card account number is valid

Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html#.name: -getCustomField:
Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html#.abstract: Retrieve the value of a custom field by its field identifier.

Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html#.name: -clear
Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html#.abstract: Clear all values to prevent sensitive data to be captured.

Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html.name: BAMCheckoutCardInformation
Classes/BAMCheckoutCardInformation.html.abstract: Contains card details returned by a BAMCheckout Scan.

Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html.name: BAMCheckoutConfiguration
Classes/BAMCheckoutConfiguration.html.abstract: Handle configuration of the BAMCheckout Mobile SDK.

Classes/BAMCheckoutViewController.html.name: BAMCheckoutViewController
Classes/BAMCheckoutViewController.html.abstract: Handle setup and presentation of the BAMCheckout Mobile SDK.

Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.name: BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayViewController
Classes/BAMCheckoutCustomScanOverlayView.abstract: Handles setup and presentation of the BAMCheckout Mobile SDK.
